name: Java Script
description: JavaScript is a scripting or programming language that allows you to implement complex features on web pages

name: Cascading Style Sheets
description: CSS allows you to create great-looking web pages, but how does it work under the hood? This article explains what CSS is with a simple syntax example and also covers some key terms about the language.

name: HTML
description: HyperText Markup Language (HTML) is the standard markup language for documents designed to be displayed in a web browser. It defines the content and structure of web content.
